meanings.definition: To make beautiful or more beautiful.
meanings.sent1: She used colorful flowers to beautify her garden.
meanings.sent2: The artist's brush strokes helped beautify the plain canvas.
meanings.sent3: The little girl tried to beautify her doll with stickers.
meanings.sent4: His kind words beautify the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunset's colors beautify the sky every evening.

meanings.definition: To enhance the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: Adding a fresh coat of paint can beautify an old house.
meanings.sent2: The new curtains helped beautify the living room.
meanings.sent3: The chef used garnishes to beautify the dish before serving.
meanings.sent4: Her smile can beautify even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The decorations beautify the party venue for the celebration.
